metadata.title: CVE-2020-19861 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: When a zone file in ldns 1.7.1 is parsed, the function ldns_nsec3_salt_data is too trusted for the length value obtained from the zone file. When the memcpy is copied, the 0xfe - ldns_rdf_size(salt_rdf) byte data can be copied, causing heap overflow information leakage.

criterions.comment: ldns package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
